system.requirements:
Tier 3; Strength 45, Bulging Biceps 
Aptitudes: Offence, Strength
system.effect: Character can spend a Fate Point to gain Unnatual Strength (X), or increase it by X until the end of their turn. Where X any number up to the character's Strength Bonus. At the end of their turn, the character gains X Fatigue.

description.value: Character can spend a Fate Point to gain Unnatual Strength (X), or increase it by X until the end of their turn. Where X any number up to the character's Strength Bonus. At the end of their turn, the character gains X Fatigue.
